programme.title: Missing - EP 8
programme.desc: Last September, a tsunami swept across the city of Palu, Indonesia. Many were dead, while many went missing. Some bodies were not recovered and families continue to search for hope. A year of silence, a year of searching, and a year of waiting in anxiousness. But how long can this hope last?

programme.title: Portrait Of Home - EP 16
programme.desc: The Fishball factory Tong Xin Yuan is a successful local business, with thriving sales in both Singapore and overseas. But behind the company lies a dark mystery. The founder of Tong Xin Yuan, Zhou Dong (Chen Shucheng), married a beautiful factory worker Li Tian (Louise Li) many years ago. They had three sons - Dadi (Adrian Pang), Dashan (San Yow) and Daqiu (Cavin Soh). Zhou Dong disappeared after a kidnap attempt went awry; not even his body was found.

But the real target was Sky himself, as proved by a second attempted murder soon afterwards. To protect the star, Greco insists on Beretta taking over as guitarist for the following concerts.

programme.title: Femmes De L'art - EP 6
programme.desc: It was said of her that: ''Eve had finally become Adam's equal''. A society artist, liberated and uninhibited in the Paris of the interwar years, Lempicka mainly painted female nudes and portraits, mixing a modern aesthetic and mannerism, in the style of the Roaring Twenties.

programme.desc: Porto Rico is a splendid and lush archipelago which lives in the shadow of the United States. Only three out of the twenty or so islands are inhabited. Life there is far from easy because the islands are often hit by hurricanes, but the people always have a smile.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 10
programme.desc: Italy is divided between the favoured North and more precarious South. Its ageing population and the migration problems it is facing add to a unique political history. We look back at events and the phenomenon of Georgia Meloni, who is reviving a form of Italian neo-nationalism.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Pays Des Sourds
programme.desc: Jean-Claude, Abou, Claire, Florent and the others are profoundly deaf. They all dream, think and communicate through signs. What is their world like? Nicolas Philibert takes us deep into the land of silence, where sight and touch are so important.

programme.title: Jesus 2020
programme.desc: Claire is responsible for the PR plan for a small parish. Distinctly short of motivation she allows herself to be caught up in the enthusiasm of young Father Vianney. The result is a campaign that is so successful that Jesus himself seems to have replied, via a Twitter account.

programme.title: Envoye Special
programme.desc: In-depth reports, investigations, unseen interviews, detailed profiles, testimonies... The current affairs show that is always on the move, up close to events and all those involved!

programme.title: Martin Roumagnac
programme.desc: In a small provincial town, Blanche Ferrand hopes to marry a rich consul, Mr de Laubry, whose wife is seriously ill. One evening, at a boxing match, she meets Martin Roumagnac, head of a building company, who falls madly in love with her. And so begins a passionate love affaire...

programme.title: Avant-Garde
programme.desc: 1984, the French-German border. A gallery owner from Berlin is carrying with him a flagship sculpture of his collection to present it in a major exhibition. But on seeing the object, the French customs officer is hesitant: is it really an artwork?

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'economie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Face Aux Territoires - EP 10
programme.desc: A key personality from the world of politics, economics, trade unions... answers questions from the regional press on local, national and international current affairs.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 10
programme.desc: Italy is divided between the favoured North and more precarious South. Its ageing population and the migration problems it is facing add to a unique political history. We look back at events and the phenomenon of Georgia Meloni, who is reviving a form of Italian neo-nationalism.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Cambodge, La Magie Khmere
programme.desc: From legendary temples to idyllic beaches, Cambodia is brimming with treasures. Steeped in rituals and beliefs, the country has found its own route to modernisation, as its capital city, Phnom Penh, clearly demonstrates. Far from urban hustle and bustle, Cambodians protect their natural and artistic heritage and their age-old culture.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre - EP 8
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cedric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: L'actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Merci Professeur ! - EP 73
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Chateau ! - EP 6
programme.desc: The Chateau de Cande has passed through the hands of a series of extravagant billionaires. It is best-known for hosting the wedding of Edward VIII, Duke of Windsor, to Wallis Simpson. Lying between Loches and Montrichard, Montpoupon Castle has been used as a film location on several occasions.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Courants D'est - EP 18
programme.desc: Deeply attached to her mountains, Lorraine Pierrat uses only local produce. She is one of only two women honoured by the French gastronomic guide Gault et Millau.

programme.title: Le Messager, Une Histoire De L'arnm
programme.desc: The speed with which the first Covid-19 vaccine was created is a veritable prowess, made possible by messenger RNA technology. We delve into this little known therapy, result of decades of research, explained by the scientists who worked tirelessly for its development.

programme.title: Le 6h00 Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Mcdonald's - Avant-Matchs
programme.desc: Presenting the next day of the French football championship.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Courants D'est - EP 18
programme.desc: Deeply attached to her mountains, Lorraine Pierrat uses only local produce. She is one of only two women honoured by the French gastronomic guide Gault et Millau.

programme.title: Chateau ! - EP 6
programme.desc: The Chateau de Cande has passed through the hands of a series of extravagant billionaires. It is best-known for hosting the wedding of Edward VIII, Duke of Windsor, to Wallis Simpson. Lying between Loches and Montrichard, Montpoupon Castle has been used as a film location on several occasions.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 26
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 27
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 15
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 30
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 29
programme.desc: Tracked by Mr Agrotek's drone, Lila looks for somewhere to hide. She eventually returns to the barn where she finds her father. Meanwhile, Tom takes charge of the cafe left to him by Julie, but quickly realises that he needs help.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Les Quatre Coins De L'assiette - EP 6
programme.desc: Chefs Pierre-Olivier Pelletier and Cassandre Osterroth prepare and cook guinea fowl with mushrooms in regional style, that of Quebec City and its terroir.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Mise Au Point
programme.desc: The best reports from ''Mise au Point'', the programme that takes a fresh look at national and international news events. Through its exclusive investigations and in-depth reports, ''Mise au Point'' tackles a wide range of topics: politics, economics, social issues, sports, culture and new trends.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Les Petits Meurtres D'agatha Christie
programme.desc: In a magnificent Chateau transformed into an ultra-select night club, Madame Maude brings together, for the greater pleasure of her wealthy clients, young students game for anything. Greco's team have to investigate undercover in this steamy world, one already infiltrated by the French secret service.

programme.title: Marathon Des Sables Jordanie 2024 - Meilleurs Moments
programme.desc: We head off to the magnificent Wadi Rum desert, in Jordan, for a timeless marathon in a breathtaking setting. On the programme: a week-long adventure in the desert divided into three stages, to be completed at the participants' pace.

programme.title: #Investigation - EP 6
programme.desc: Your rendezvous for current affairs and investigative journalism from the RTBF teams. Research, evidence, personal stories and confrontations are at the heart of the film reports about a range of subjects mainly relating to Belgian society. The key words? Independence and transparency!

programme.title: Movie - Thalaivaa
programme.desc: Vishwa runs a small business in Sydney, unaware that his father is a gangster in Mumbai. When his father is killed by a rival, Vishwa takes over his crime syndicate, with revenge on his mind.

programme.title: Movie - Ram Charan
programme.desc: Ram, a youngster, is betrayed in love. He meets Jaanu, his classmate, and falls in love with her. When she accepts his proposal, she asks him to promise her a lifetime relationship, but he hesitates.

programme.title: Movie - Thulli Ezhundhadhu Kadhal
programme.desc: Nandini, Kishore, Mahesh, Scud, Bhakti, Jessica, Chandana and Sridhar are college friends. Once they graduate, they start focussing on their careers. However, there is more to their life than that.

programme.title: Movie - Thullum Kaalam
programme.desc: This movie stars Pandiarajan, Vineetha, Rajeev and Tharika, and is directed by Sarana. Produced by Lakshmi Shankar Movies.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Sondhakaran
programme.desc: A vengeful criminal frames a policeman for sexual assault. After serving his sentence, he starts working as a watchman and saves residents of a building from a fraudster who runs a chit fund.

programme.title: Movie - Abirami
programme.desc: Saravanan, a jobless man, is madly in love with Dhanam, one of the five daughters of Abhirami. But things change when her marriage gets fixed and he ends up taking care of Dhanam's sisters.

programme.title: Movie - Vambu Chanda
programme.desc: A rich boy learns that his real father is someone else, alive and in a mental asylum. He puts him under the care of an Ayurveda specialist and soon discovers the culprits behind his father's plight.

programme.title: Movie - Soorasamharam
programme.desc: Pandian, a police officer, sets out to take revenge on a drug lord for the murder of his best friend Arun. However, Pandian gets abducted by the criminal and is forced into drug addiction.

programme.title: Movie - Vanchinathan
programme.desc: A cop who can go to any means to arrest a criminal is challenged by a popular newspaper owner, who always prints chaotic news. He is the eye-witness to a murder done by the newspaper owner, but he cannot prove it.

programme.title: Movie - Puthiya Vaanam
programme.desc: Pandidurai adopts military officer Jeevadurai's son Rajaratnam after Govindan, a criminal, kills him. Years later, Rajaratnam becomes a policeman and must take down Govindan and his henchman.

programme.title: Movie - Udhayamagiradhu
programme.desc: A girl becomes a dancer when her mother falls ill, but is exploited by the rich villagers. She takes refuge under a revered figure, but he too falters. She then decides to start life afresh.

programme.title: Movie - Ullam
programme.desc: Raja, an introvert, falls in love with Kavitha, who helped him to become an extrovert. Things turn chaotic when Raja comes to know about Kavitha's dark past.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Kanagavel Kaaka
programme.desc: A court employee, son of an honest judge treated wrongly, takes it upon himself to clean up the judicial system.

programme.title: Movie - Varushamellam Vasantham
programme.desc: Raja's grandfather constantly berates him for being uneducated and jobless. Meanwhile the old man's other grandson, Ramesh, has a good job. Trouble follows when both try to woo the same girl.

programme.title: Movie - Puriyatha Puthir
programme.desc: Puriyaadha Puthir is a 1990 Indian Tamil-language mystery thriller written and directed by K. S. Ravikumar.

programme.title: Movie - Asathal
programme.desc: Vetri leads a carefree life with his two best friends. When an unknown woman dies leaving behind her baby, Vetri claims in court that he is the father to avoid marriage and puts himself in trouble.

programme.title: Movie - Kodi
programme.desc: Twins Kodi and Anbu have different personalities: while one is into politics, the other is a pacifist. But a twist in their fates causes one to adopt the other's life and seek revenge.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2024/25 - EP 16
programme.desc: Being the only player Pep Guardiola has signed twice, as well as being the first ever Manchester City captain to lift the Champions League, Ilkay Gundogan’s importance to the club cannot be understated. In this week’s Big Interview, we learn how a boy brought up in a German mining town, played under Jurgen Klopp at Borussia Dortmund, suffered multiple long-term injuries and bounced back stronger, became a club legend at City.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Everton (MW13) - EP 128
programme.desc: This is Ruben Amorim’s first home league game in charge of Manchester United. Since the start of last season, the Portuguese has won all 22 of his home league games in charge of Sporting CP by an aggregate score of 72-13.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Manchester United (MW14) (Live) - EP 137
programme.desc: Arsenal have won their last three Premier League games against Manchester United - they’ve never won four in a row against the Red Devils in their league history.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Liverpool (MW14) - EP 135
programme.desc: Newcastle have lost their last six Premier League games against Liverpool, and are winless in 15 against the Reds since a 2-0 win in December 2015 (D4 L11).

programme.desc: Wolves have won five of their last six league games against Everton (D1), more victories than they’d managed in their previous 21 against them (W4 D8 L9).

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Brentford (MW14) - EP 138
programme.desc: Brentford have never won an away league game against Aston Villa (D6 L3), with the Bees only facing Stoke (14) and Halifax Town (11) more often on the road without ever winning in their league history.

programme.title: Southampton vs Chelsea (MW14) - EP 136
programme.desc: Southampton have won their last two Premier League games against Chelsea, as many as in their previous 18 (D5 L11). They last won three consecutive league games against the Blues between 1979 and 1985.

programme.title: FS MMA Bruno Capdeville vs. Ryan Brigham
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Bruno Capdeville and Ryan Brigham put on a show in Evansville, IN, USA.

programme.title: WCCB Gervonta Davis vs. Hector Luis Garcia
programme.desc: Five time World Champion and boxing superstar Gervonta 'Tank' Davis and undefeated World Champion Hector Luis Garcia kick off the year by headlining a stacked card from the Capital One Arena in Washington DC. Davis has established himself as one boxing's must-see attractions, and will be defending his WBA Lightweight World Championship against Garcia in the Main Event.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Shane Mosley vs. Saul (Canelo) Alvarez
programme.desc: This episode features the WBC light middleweight title bout when Shane Mosley battles Saul (Canelo) Alvarez, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Winky Wright
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight title contest featuring 47-4-1 Bernard Hopkins and the 51-3-1 Winky Wright, who has not lost a bout in over seven years.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Goeido, Abi, Kisenosato and Tochinoshin from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector 'Macho' Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

They were using them as pom-poms to cheerlead Pink Ninja as she ran the Toyland Marathon Race! The Ninjas are very sorry that they upset Farmer Tom but he tells them that it's alright.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 32

But when Pat-Pat and the Pockets invite him to share a piece of toy cake, Noddy suddenly has a breakthrough: maybe it wasn't one toy who took lots of pieces but lots of toys who each took one piece.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 34

She can jump really high! Then Flea can jump everywhere and see everything.! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24) - EP 599

programme.desc: On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalised. After 37 years, investigators tap into a public genealogy website that leads them to the killer they've been hunting.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S2) - EP 20
programme.desc: In February 2010, two gunmen shoot Michael Temple Jr, rendering him quadriplegic for the five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA from a knife is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.desc: Kerri has an online gambling addiction that is tearing her family apart. Devonte's gaming addiction makes Lisa question his ability to be a good father and husband.

programme.title: An American Girl: Chrissa Stands Strong
programme.desc: When Chrissa moves to a new school in the middle of the year, she is greeted by the girls in her fourth-grade class with teasing and tricks.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: The Bears realise that eco-friendly tote bags are their way of gaining acceptance amongst the progressive people of the Bay Area after being shamed for asking for plastic grocery bags.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: Panda is an avid e-dater and when a French woman matches with him and agrees to a video chat date, the Bears engineer the situation so that Panda can show his best side, even if it's exaggerated.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: Chloe realises that Ice Bear only runs errands for his brothers so she is determined to show him a fun day in the city, even if it means staying in a museum after it closes.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S1 - EP 24

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day's agenda. programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC's Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what's driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow's trading day.

programme.title: Europe Street Signs
programme.desc: One hour into Europe's equity session, "Street Signs" provides the street's view and a link to business stories trending online and on social. programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: Hello World
programme.desc: The Airship Stikes Back. We travel from California to Ohio to the Hindenburg's birthplace in Germany to see if this new old style of aviation can really make a comeback.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: The tiny former Soviet nation of Kyrgyzstan hopes to join the global tech economy; we hang out with blockbuster YouTube success D-Billions and learn about a darker side of its society.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Our journey through Kyrgyzstan continues as we get to know the ambitious young women behind a coding army that might one day lead a local tech revolution.

programme.title: Hello World
programme.desc: Best known as the heart of American entertainment, Los Angeles is fast becoming a hub for hard-tech startups. In Part 1, we look at the innovative manufacturing companies finding new ways to make modern marvels, from robots that can do detailed metalworking to a machine that can 3D print on a massive scale.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: In Part two, we dive deep into LA's burgeoning space industry, one that's been supercharged by talented veterans of SpaceX.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Best-selling author Ashlee Vance travels the world to engage with the most brilliant, audacious and controversial pioneers in science and technology.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Switzerland is full of advanced tech startups. We visit an inventor who makes drones do miraculous things and a company that's growing human skin in a lab.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: From a company that helps restore movement in the paralysed to brain-research labs combining neuroscience and AI, Switzerland is home to some of the most advanced research on the brain.

programme.title: Hello World
programme.desc: Burning Man meets Mad Max at King of the Hammers, a 212-mile-long offroad race in the California desert that only the hardiest racers with the most kitted-out vehicles will even finish.

programme.title: RUIN
programme.desc: A feature documentary about Sam Bankman-Fried and the stunning collapse of FTX, his cryptocurrency exchange.

programme.title: How India's Narendra Modi Took Power
programme.desc: Narendra Modi, India's prime minister, is both highly popular and deeply polarizing. How did he get to the top of Indian politics, and what do his policies mean for the country's future?

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance Radio
programme.desc: The economy and the markets are "under surveillance" as we cover the latest in finance, economics and investment. Join Tom Keene, Paul Sweeney, Lisa Mateo, Michael Barr and other guests.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 1
programme.desc: In a remote village temple in India, a daring heist saw precious and ancient cultural heritage disappear. Two citizen detectives work to bring down one of the biggest art thieves in history.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 2
programme.desc: The Green Bible is the single-most important document in the Italian government's war against an alleged Nigerian mafia. But this supposed mafia handbook isn't what it claims to be at all.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 3
programme.desc: The tale of the strange life and stranger murder of a rare violin collector and his daughter, as told by their friends and two suspects at the heart of the police investigation.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: In 2021, Agnes Tirop broke the women's 10,000 meter world record. Five weeks later, she was dead. We examine her murder and the threat of violence for other Kenyan runners.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: A "shadow fleet" of aging tankers is keeping Russian oil flowing. Bloomberg set out to uncover the network of intermediaries working to sell the Kremlin's oil while getting rich in the process.

programme.title: Bloomberg BusinessWeek
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring together the latest news from the world of business and finance by harnessing the power of Bloomberg Businessweek reporters and editors.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Google & Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai sits down with Emily Chang to discuss the future of search, accelerating work on Google's AI models and how his upbringing prepared him for this moment.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Can Anduril Reboot the US Defense Industry? Emily Chang meets Anduril founder Palmer Luckey for a closer look at his defence tech startup's autonomous fleet and software operations.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Ryan Kaji is the reigning king of toy videos and one of YouTube's biggest and highest-paid social media stars. Emily Chang meets Ryan and his parents on the set of his new movie for a look at the young influencer's next act.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Emily Chang interviews JPMorgan Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon, a titan in the banking industry known for his freewheeling style, about his outlook on markets, tech and geopolitical risk.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Endeavor & TKO CEO Ari Emanuel to discuss how he built a multi-billion dollar sports and entertainment empire, the future of Hollywood and what's next.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Instacart CEO Fidji Simo in her hometown in the South of France, and learns about her journey from a small fishing village to the C-Suite in Silicon Valley.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: The Advanced Micro Devices CEO spent the better part of her ten year career engineering one of the biggest turnarounds in Silicon Valley history. Now she's preparing for battle against NVIDIA.

programme.desc: Daily sports show features major stories and issues making news in the world of sports.

programme.title: Connect the World
programme.desc: Becky Anderson explores diverse perspectives and explains global issues of the day.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: The World From Above
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the world's most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: World Of Durian
programme.desc: A program that will review all types of durian typical of the archipelago, starting from the history, taste and specialty of each durian.

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: A culinary program that finds out what makes celebrities crave fancy food like prata, grilled meat, sushi, satay, ice cream and even a big English breakfast.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. programme.desc: Hyunsung Hospital is the best national hospital with the most advanced medical techniques. Could we think of him as good?

programme.desc: Spoof hit songs, hilarious reenactment of classic scenes and more - The Heavenly Party is here to bring you more wacky entertainment!

programme.title: Gourmet Express
programme.desc: Hong Kong is home to gourmet food from all over the world. Our food anchors and hosts keep up with the latest foodie information and offers, gaining an in-depth understanding of the stories behind the taste.

programme.title: Eyes On Concern Groups
programme.desc: There are many types of online groups, with various topics like food, entertainment, hobbies and relationships attracting the attention of netizens. Our hosts follow some highly-popular groups in depth, discussing and fact-checking the information.

programme.title: The Legend of Xiao Chuo - EP 35
programme.desc: Xiao Yanyan and Han Derang are childhood sweethearts, but get separated when she is sent to the palace as the consort of Yelu Xian. With wit and dedication, she transforms into the most powerful woman in the Liao dynasty.

programme.title: News At 18:30 and Global View
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every evening at 6:30pm.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: The body of the urban dweller is prone to problems. Vital Lifeline deconstructs your health. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of various diseases, as well as physical therapists and sports therapists to teach appropriate exercises.

programme.title: Scoop 2024
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2441
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Call Of Destiny - EP 10
programme.desc: Fang Ri Jin unexpectedly connects with Xing Ke Lan, who is in a future timeline and trapped in a crisis. Is fate already predetermined? Will Ri Jin choose to compromise, or will he take a leap of faith to rewrite the destiny?

programme.title: Sword and Fairy 1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Adapted from game Chinese Paladin, the story follows Li Xiaoyao, a waiter with hero dreams, and Zhao Ling'er, a descendant of Nuwa. They face challenges in search of the Spirit Pearl, courageously embarking on a journey to save the world.

programme.title: Connecting Earth And Sky
programme.desc: This show invites well-known artists from different industries to step out of their comfort zones and embark on a journey full of challenges and surprises.

programme.title: EXTRA
programme.desc: Keep up with the news on the entertainment circle in Hong Kong and all over the world, with reports on the latest drama series, movies, concert highlights, award ceremonies and more.

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Global View
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every day.

programme.title: Word Twisters' Adventures - EP 3
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate - EP 3
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, De's father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)'s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Ringmaster, The - EP 1
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Last Breakthrough, The - EP 19
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force", an international medical humanitarian organization, to carry out the unfulfilled wish of his deceased girlfriend, TUNG (LEUNG WING KEI, GIGI). He also sets up "Lung Shing Medical Centre" to help the poor. _x000D__x000D_ When FUN is working with the organization in Kenya, he meets a young doctor called CHAI PAK HANG (LAM, RAYMOND), who works at a private hospital named "Ling Siu" in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Vigilante Force - EP 9
programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion. One day, the headquarters appoints a superior, YIN (MA TAK CHUNG, JOE), to his division, killing all his hope. AH gets along with his colleagues. YIN is straight with his subordinates. Who will gain more co-operation from their colleagues? _x000D__x000D_ AH devotes himself to work.

programme.title: Vigilante Force - EP 12
programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion. One day, the headquarters appoints a superior, YIN (MA TAK CHUNG, JOE), to his division, killing all his hope. AH gets along with his colleagues. YIN is straight with his subordinates. Who will gain more co-operation from their colleagues? _x000D__x000D_ AH devotes himself to work.

programme.title: Word Twisters' Adventures - EP 4
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate - EP 4
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, De's father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)'s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Ringmaster, The - EP 1
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Last Breakthrough, The - EP 20
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force", an international medical humanitarian organization, to carry out the unfulfilled wish of his deceased girlfriend, TUNG (LEUNG WING KEI, GIGI). He also sets up "Lung Shing Medical Centre" to help the poor. _x000D__x000D_ When FUN is working with the organization in Kenya, he meets a young doctor called CHAI PAK HANG (LAM, RAYMOND), who works at a private hospital named "Ling Siu" in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Vigilante Force - EP 11

programme.title: Vigilante Force - EP 14
programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion. One day, the headquarters appoints a superior, YIN (MA TAK CHUNG, JOE), to his division, killing all his hope. AH gets along with his colleagues. YIN is straight with his subordinates. Who will gain more co-operation from their colleagues? _x000D__x000D_ AH devotes himself to work.

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: My Wife is 18
programme.desc: Cheung, a dull thirty-year-old man, gets married in the UK to lovely YoYo, who is just eighteen, so as to fulfil their parents' wishes. Back in Hong Kong, their relationship is that of an assumed couple, as well as a teacher and student. With contradictions and funny incidents governing their relationship, the two gradually fall in love...

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: My Darling Genie
programme.desc: A genie who is trapped in a Chinese oil umbrella helps an honorable young man and his uncle to deal with a covetous loan shark.

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: Feel 100% 2003
programme.desc: Based on the popular comic book of the same name, Jerry and Lok are two best buddies with a common goal of finding their perfect girlfriend. Neither of them has ever encountered anything close to their "100% girl", until they meet the fabulous Cherie. The two decide to compete for her affections, but who will succeed?

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jin's pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wife's death.

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: Frugal Game
programme.desc: How do you overcome unemployment, divorce and crippling debt? Diana and Wai start a fake family to join a frugal game show on TV. To stimulate ratings, the producer forces the director, Tsui, to twist the game from an encouraging environment to a torturing one. As the fake family gets close to the prize, Tsui comes up with some bad ideas...

programme.title: Wonder Women
programme.desc: This is the story about a career woman and her friend going through life with their resilience and perseverance during the highs and lows of the Hong Kong economy over a decade, from the Handover in 1997 through 2007.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy, where a murdered police officer returns from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie cop into avenging his death.

programme.title: Sex Beyond The Grave
programme.desc: During World War II, a singer was raped and killed by Master Tao during her escape, with all her valuables stolen as well. Since then, the Tao's house became haunted. Years later, Master Tao's descendant sells the house to a young couple to pay off a massive gambling debt, but the couple soon discover that it is haunted by the vengeful spirit...

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: Man Wanted 3
programme.desc: Street kid Dong idolizes Mongkok triad leader Pu Jun and inadvertently joins his gang. When rival Xi Yang seizes control by illicit means, Pu Jun decides to take him down. At the same time, Pu Jun uncovers Dong as a police undercover and banishes him, but Dong sheds his undercover identity to join Pu Jun to seek revenge against Xi Yang.

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Chow stars as Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husband's death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Perfect Girls
programme.desc: Chi will inherit his dying grandfather's fortune with one condition - he has to be married in a month, otherwise the money goes to his uncle, Robert. Chi falls in love with Siu Siu, but Robert intends to stop them by sending Moraine to seduce Chi. When Moraine decides to marry Chi for money, Robert stops her and reveals their plot.

programme.title: 36 Secrets of Courtship
programme.desc: This erotic comedy features three lotharios who vie to become principal of the Macho Man Training School -- an extremely sexy institution dedicated to extremely non Shaolin-types of physical exertion.

programme.title: Crazy N' The City
programme.desc: An apathetic Hong Kong police officer, Chris, is weary of his 7-year patrol unit work life. Tension arises when an energetic and conscientious policewoman, Nam, becomes his partner. However, as time goes by, Nam's dedication and bravery in her line of duty begins to reignite Chris' passion for work and life.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon II
programme.desc: This is a sequel to "Casino Tycoon". 20 years after Benny Ho established his casino empire in Macau, his former partner becomes envious and plots to bring him down. At the same time, a young man working for Benny is the son of his ex-lover, and is also out to take revenge on him. Ho however, is not about to take things lying down...

programme.title: One Nite in Mongkok
programme.desc: A mainland hitman Loy is hired to avenge the death of a gangster's son but the police are onto him from the start. While hiding in the dense streets of Mongkok, Loy saves a call girl Dan Dan from some gangsters. Loy and Dan Dan are hunted around Mongkok by police and gangsters. Who wiIl find them first, the lawful force or the lawless one?

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lin's husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung's house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung's mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandit's camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leader's wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Tao's real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend's baby...

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chan's family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chan's daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: Woman of the Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this "young" auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: The Lovers Blades, a pair of invincible weapons, are to be delivered to the Qing Emperor. However, they accidentally fell into the hands of Xiao Zhong Hui and Yuan Guan Nan, so Imperial Chief Zhuo Tian Xiong hunts them down for the blades. As the battle begins, the secret of the blades are also revealed.

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his son's arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bat's knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit...

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return...

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the "Full Moon Scimitar", on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon's clutches.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This intriguing wuxia saga is packed with conspiracies, power schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres around the struggle for underworld supremacy between two clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1837
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Strange Tales of Tang Dynasty II - To The West - EP 34
programme.desc: Set during Tang Dynasty's peak, the sequel follows Lu Lingfeng (Yang Xuwen), head of the Dali Temple, and Su Wuming (Yang Zhigang), a Qianling official as they leave Chang'an for the west on a fearless journey to unravel mysterious cases amid lurking dangers.
